channel.title: 508 HD full screen, resizable client
channel.description:
Hi,
Is there any 508 HD client that is fullscreen and resizable?
I am looking for one.
I'm searching for one like this: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2m5ldep.png[/img]
If you have one, please give a dl link or pm me the link.
[b]PS: WHY DO MOD REMOVE MY TOPIC? PLEASE GIVE ME AN ANSWER![/b]
Kind regards, Jesse [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnpmod.gif[/img] Don't post your question in every section you can click on. You did not once post in the correct section. In fact, requests aren't allowed period.
As for going against a moderator, that is entirely unacceptable. You have been moderated for one week. Consider that a light punishment for what you did.[/center]
